com.markussecundus.forms.elements.impl.utils

Class DefaultSizeBehavior<Pos,Scalar extends java.lang.Comparable<Scalar>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.markussecundus.forms.elements.impl.utils.DefaultSizeBehavior<Pos,Scalar>
  • Type Parameters:
    Pos - Vector type used to define the position and dimensions of the DrawableElem Must by decomposable into separate scalars corresponding to its individual dimensions by the provided VectDecomposer.
    Scalar - The type that Pos's individual components consist of (- see VectUtil ) must be Comparable with itself so that it can be determined whether it is inside the set bounds.

    public class DefaultSizeBehavior<Pos,Scalar extends java.lang.Comparable<Scalar>>
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class that implemets the canonical way of how the dimension properties of DrawableElem should behave. Supposed use is to make an instance of this owned by a DrawableElem and let the DrawableElem redirect the calls for its size Properties to this class. The behavior is achieved through EventListeners added to Properties's .setterListener()._getUtilListeners() (- see: Property, EventDelegate) Default behavior: the realSize attains the value of prefSize in all the dimensions, where it is within the boundary given by the same dimensions of minSize and maxSize. Where it is not within the bounds, the crossed bound will be used instead. If sizeConstraint is set, the lower of the components of either it or maxSize is used as the higher boundary.
    Author:
    MarkusSecundus
    See Also:
    DrawableElem, BasicAbstractDrawableElem

    • Field Detail

      • maxSize

        public final Property<Pos> maxSize
        The upper boundary for the value of realSize

      • minSize

        public final Property<Pos> minSize
        The lower boundary for the value of realSize

      • prefSize

        public final Property<Pos> prefSize
        The preffered value for realSize

      • sizeConstraint

        public final Property<Pos> sizeConstraint
        The optional additional upper boundary for the value of realSize. Should be set only by internal utilies of this library, not by the user, unless he is really confident in what he is doing.

      • realSize

        public final ReadonlyProperty<Pos> realSize
        Property that represents the real value that a cannonical instance of DrawableElem should attain given the values of the other size Properties. Can be set only through modifiing the other size Properties.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DefaultSizeBehavior

        public DefaultSizeBehavior(Pos MAX,
                           Pos MIN,
                           Pos DEF_PREF,
                           VectDecomposer<Pos,Scalar> comp)
        Creates and sets all the size properties along with the listeners needed for their right functionality. Sets the sizeConstraint to null.
        Parameters:
        MAX - default value for the upper boundary for the positions
        MIN - default value for the lower boundary for the positions
        DEF_PREF - default value for preffered size value
        comp - the utility used to decompose the currently used type of Pos into its individual components
